code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import"./popularRestaurants.css";import RestaurantCard from"./reataurantCard/RestaurantCard";import{useSelector,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{filterRestaurants}from"../../../../store/slices/restaurantsSlice";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var PopularRestaurants=function PopularRestaurants(){var restaurantsData=useSelector(function(state){return state.restaurants.value;});var dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(function(){dispatch(filterRestaurants('all'));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"populars-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"popular restaurant in epicure:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"popular-cards-container",children:restaurantsData.slice(0,3).map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RestaurantCard,{img:item.img,name:item.name,chef:item.chef,rating:item.rating,location:"/restaurants/",id:item.id});})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{id:"all-restaurants-btn",children:["All Restaurants ",'>>']})]});};export default PopularRestaurants;
